title: Runway incursion: SpiceJet grounds 2 pilots in Varanasi
article_body: NEW DELHI: has grounded two pilots whose plane went beyond the holding point and had a at Varanasi on Tuesday when an IndiGo plane was about to take off from the same strip. Air traffic controllers alerted the Indi-Go aircraft in time which then safely aborted the take-off. A SpiceJet spokesman said: “On Tuesday, SpiceJet 737 800 aircraft (VT-SGH) was scheduled to operate SG-705, sector Varanasi to Hyderabad. While taxiing to the Varanasi runway, it inadvertently crossed the runway holding point. The ATC asked the pilot to hold position and later cleared it for take-off.”
